events.name: Russian air strikes on Idlib province, Syria
events.wd_label: Russian air strikes on Idlib province, Syria
events.wd_description: At least nine people were reportedly killed after Russian air strikes on the rebel-held Idlib province in Syria. The United Nations expressed concerns about the hostilities in the province.
events.description: At least nine people were reportedly killed after Russian air strikes on the rebel-held Idlib province in Syria. The United Nations expressed concerns about the hostilities in the province.

events.name: Casualties in Idlib
events.wd_description: Bombs dropped from warplanes killed nine people next to a market outside Jisr al-Shughour, and two others were killed in an air strike near Idlib city.
events.description: Bombs dropped from warplanes killed nine people next to a market outside Jisr al-Shughour, and two others were killed in an air strike near Idlib city.

events.name: Monitoring group's statement
events.wd_description: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group termed the attack the deadliest Russian attack this year.
events.description: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group termed the attack the deadliest Russian attack this year.

events.name: Russia's response
events.wd_description: Russia's military did not comment on the situation immediately. Their air campaign supporting the Syrian government has been crucial in turning the tide of the civil war.
events.description: Russia's military did not comment on the situation immediately. Their air campaign supporting the Syrian government has been crucial in turning the tide of the civil war.

events.name: Retaliation for attacks
events.wd_description: The strikes were said to be a retaliation for attacks that had killed civilians in government-held Hama and Latakia provinces.
events.description: The strikes were said to be a retaliation for attacks that had killed civilians in government-held Hama and Latakia provinces.

events.name: Putin visits Russian-controlled regions in Ukraine
events.wd_label: Putin visits Russian-controlled regions in Ukraine
events.wd_description: Russian President Vladimir Putin visited parts of Ukraine's southern Kherson and Luhansk regions controlled by Russia. Russia claimed to have annexed both regions, but they do not have full control.
events.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin visited parts of Ukraine's southern Kherson and Luhansk regions controlled by Russia. Russia claimed to have annexed both regions, but they do not have full control.

events.name: Putin's interaction with the military
events.wd_description: During his visit, Putin told the military that he felt it was important to hear their opinion on the developing situation, listen to them, and exchange information.
events.description: During his visit, Putin told the military that he felt it was important to hear their opinion on the developing situation, listen to them, and exchange information.

events.name: Ukrainian response
events.wd_description: Mykhailo Podolyak, an adviser to Zelensky's office, tweeted that Putin was touring the occupied and ruined territories of Ukraine to enjoy the crimes committed by his military.
events.description: Mykhailo Podolyak, an adviser to Zelensky's office, tweeted that Putin was touring the occupied and ruined territories of Ukraine to enjoy the crimes committed by his military.

events.name: Italy blocks Chinese company from taking over Pirelli
events.wd_label: Italy blocks Chinese company from taking over Pirelli
events.wd_description: Italy has moved to block a Chinese state-owned company from taking over Pirelli, a renowned tire-making industry, as part of measures to protect Pirelli's independence.
events.description: Italy has moved to block a Chinese state-owned company from taking over Pirelli, a renowned tire-making industry, as part of measures to protect Pirelli's independence.

events.name: Italian government ruling
events.wd_description: The Italian government ruled that only Camfin, a company controlled by Pirelli’s boss Marco Tronchetti Provera, has the authority to nominate candidates for its chief executive.
events.description: The Italian government ruled that only Camfin, a company controlled by Pirelli’s boss Marco Tronchetti Provera, has the authority to nominate candidates for its chief executive.

events.name: Examination under Golden Power Procedure
events.wd_description: The agreement was examined by the administration of the Italian Prime Minister under the Golden Power Procedure rules, which aim to protect businesses deemed strategically important to the nation.
events.description: The agreement was examined by the administration of the Italian Prime Minister under the Golden Power Procedure rules, which aim to protect businesses deemed strategically important to the nation.

events.name: Pirelli's ownership history
events.wd_description: Pirelli was sold for €7.1bn ($7.8bn) in 2015 to a group of investors, including ChemChina and Camfin. ChemChina later merged with state-owned Sinochem.
events.description: Pirelli was sold for €7.1bn ($7.8bn) in 2015 to a group of investors, including ChemChina and Camfin. ChemChina later merged with state-owned Sinochem.

events.name: Verkor supplying lithium batteries for Alpine C-Crossover GT
events.wd_label: Verkor supplying lithium batteries for Alpine C-Crossover GT
events.wd_description: Verkor will be supplying lithium batteries for the Alpine pure electric C-Crossover GT from its gigafactory in France starting in 2025.
events.description: Verkor will be supplying lithium batteries for the Alpine pure electric C-Crossover GT from its gigafactory in France starting in 2025.

events.name: Renault's investment in Verkor
events.wd_description: Since Renault made its investment in Verkor, the two companies have worked together at the Verkor Innovation Centre (VIC) in Grenoble to approve the technical quality and commercial production process of the battery products.
events.description: Since Renault made its investment in Verkor, the two companies have worked together at the Verkor Innovation Centre (VIC) in Grenoble to approve the technical quality and commercial production process of the battery products.

events.name: Dunkirk gigafactory production
events.wd_description: Verkor will be supplying batteries from its Dunkirk gigafactory.
events.description: Verkor will be supplying batteries from its Dunkirk gigafactory.
